features: WHAT’S ADVANTANGE THAN OTHERS - WM300 wireless lapel microphones with charging case, adopts 3 different noise reduction modes. Its own is built-in intelligent active noise reduction chip, means you can record clearly in noisey environment. In addition to its auto AI noise cancelling, there are a manually noise recuction and reverberation mode for selection, a real noise-cancelling microphone. Built-in 700mAh rechargeable battery, works up to 8hours on a single charge of 2hours. And it has 4 indicator lights information on charging case to clearly tell us the remaning power of 25% 50% 75% 100%

PLUG AND THEN PLAY – Just plug the lighting connector into iPhone iPad or Android devices, and clip the lav mic onto shirt, it starts working in One Second. Two pack mini microphones, means two people can get involved in a video recording together. Suits for Youtube, Video, live streaming, Podcast, Blog, Vlog, Zoom, Interview, Online Meeting, Online Education, TikTok and Singing recording ect.

70FT FAR DISTANCE - Built-in optimized antenna design, enables covering up to 70feet far distance indoor or outdoor stably. The omni-directional phone microphones give best clear timbre. Used upgraded high-sensitive condenser microphone, it can deely retsore the sound to most original, and even make the sound qulaity better. Ideal for Bloggers, Journalist, Mukbang, Fitness coach, Office people
PORTABLE CARRY - Concise, stylish design. The charging case holds both storage and portability. Its compact size is convenient to video shooting at anywhere, anytime

MULITI-FUNCTIONAL: WM300 wireless mic is for iPhone Android iPad. We can manually stop microphone recording by switching Up, and resume by switching Down. Holding M button, we can power off the mic to save battery. It is a worth trying lightning microphone at a afforable price

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why choose Ecomxia WM300 ? WM300 wireless lapel mic with charging case is for iPhone, Android, iPad video recording. Two Packs of mics allow a team worker to get involved in a video creating together. Or, one working, the other for backup, which give double working time. It is an ideal microphone for vlogging, interview, and live straming. Suits for Bloggers, Journalists, Teachers and Office people ect. Very Easy To Use Just take out the lighting connector from charging case and plug it into Phone, and clip the small microphone onto shirt, it starts working Immediately. No extra step!

With Charging Case Every time the case is fully charged, which allow to charge one microphone for 8 times, two microphones for 4 times Charging 1) Connect the supplied Type-C cable into Case port via 5V adapter, wall charger, or computer for charging. There are 4 indicator lights on charging case to be used to inform the user the charging progress or the remaining power of 25% ,50%, 75% and 100%. 2) Support microphone recording and phone charging simultaneously When the phone is out of power while the lighting connector is on, we can directly charge the extra lighting interface to charge the phone Excellent Clear Voice Product is equipped with upgraded high-sensitive condenser microphone, which can store the sound with a quality to be as same as original, or even better

Real-time Clear Voice Self-synchronizing with 3 Denoise Mode Using real-time auto-sync technology. Product has built-in intelligent active noise reduction chip which allows you to record clearly in noisy environment. In addition to its auto AI noise cancelling feature, there is a manual noise reduction and reverberation mode for selection, a real noise-cancelling microphone Long Time Working & Further Distance Built-in 60mAH rechargeable battery, it can work up to 7 hours, two mics mean 14 hours. Totally meet daily needs. With optimized antenna and advanced 2.4GHz transmission technology enable covering up to 70feet omni-directional distance of range indoor or outdoor stably. (No obstacles in between) Mini Microphone & Convenient Management Its compact size is easy to put in bag or suitcase. Whenever and wherever you need, it can be taken out to do video shooting immediately

Widely Compatible with Apple Devices & Android Work with ios 8.0 or above: iPhone 6, iPhone 6s, iPhone 6 plus, iPhone 6s plus, iPhone 7, iPhone 7 plus, iPhone 8, iPhone 8 plus, iPhone X, iPhone XS, iPhone XS Max, iPhone XR, iPhone 11, iPhone 11 Pro, iPhone 11 Pro Max, iPhone SE, iPhone 12, iPhone 12mini, iPhone 12pro, iPhone12proMax, iPhone 13, iPhone 13 Pro, iPhone 13 Pro Max, iPhone 13 mini, iPhone 14, iPhone 15 ect. · iPad 2018/2019/2020/2021/2022 · iPad air/pro · iPad mini/iPad mini 2/iPad mini 3/iPad mini 4 Compatible with Android Devices

Professional Vlog Microphone For Video Maker · Youtube, Twitter, Instagram, Tiktok · Vlog, Blog, Interview, Live streaming, Singing, Teaching Package: · 1 x Charging case · 2 x Transmitter with Back Clip · 1 x Receiver with Lighting connector and USB-C Connector · 1 x Type C Charging Cable · 1 x User Manual Kindly Note: The microphone does not support Phone Calls and Online Meeting

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is so easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: This is so easy to use, thank god because I am not tech savvy!Connects to your phone just when you plug it in and you don't have to really mess with bluetooth or wifi and the sound quality is amazing! I've tested even how far you could get from your phone and this would work perfectly for any content creator! You can step further away from your phone if needed if you're in the gym or something and it's also great for talking videos! I use it along with the captions app for any video editing and they work so well together to cancel out any additional noise in the video!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for beginners
reviews.reviewText: I used this to record a wedding ceremony. We clipped it inside the grooms pocket. The sound quality is excellent. I controlled it from my seat with my iphone. Fantastic price for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My daughter and her friend mic’d up at their scrimmage. Easy to attach under their uniform and even being under clothing the sound quality was still great. They interviewed other players with it and the sound was very clear and not muffled.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It just works
reviews.reviewText: I got these for the purpose of recording Instagram reels, YouTube videos, TikTok, etc. Also, I record my sessions with my personal trainer and often had the problem of not being able to hear him in the video over the other background noise in the CrossFit gym: people talking loudly around us, weights clanging and echoing, loud music. Unless he was standing next to my phone.This mic set has been a game changer. Now, all of that noise fades into the background and is hardly audible. I love that this has 2 mics, so he and I both wear one for our sessions. Now I can hear him on the video even when he is far from the phone.During one recent session I was doing a sled pull down a length of turf. He was at the other end and you can hear him clearly as if he was standing next to the phone. Another trainer was talking to his client next to my phone and isn’t audible at all.Here’s what’s great:• super easy plug and play. Take them out of the case, plug in the receiver to the bottom of the phone, clip on the mics, and you’re good to go. No need to connect manually.• clear audio even from across a loud gym• everything in a charging case makes it easy to transport. The case fits in the palm of my hand.What could be better:• it’s not clear how the manual noise cancellation works. The manual is tiny print and hard to read• the microphones are a little large and when clipped onto the neck of my trainer’s t-shirt they stick in his neck. I clip mine onto my sports bra strap. I’d love a mic that was a little smaller.Those are little issues. The bottom line is that this mic works well and does what it needs to do at a fraction of the price of some well-known brands.Just get it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great microphones, clear and crisp
reviews.reviewText: Been using this set of two microphones for 11 months with no issues. Flawless sound capture. I rarely use both microphones simultaneously but when I did use them together they worked great. I wanted two microphones so I could easily switch when the battery went low but I have not yet run the battery down in a single day, even on very long days of recording. The batteries just keep going and capturing great sound. Highly recommend them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Total scam- doesn’t work after 1 month
reviews.reviewText: Update: I lost my first pair and ordered a second one. The second set worked for just a few videos, and then began malfunctioning. For some reason, it remains stuck on the function that picks up lots of background noise. I have to manually click into the noise, cancellation mode, but unfortunately, there is a ton of static over my voice when I use that mode. I randomly click into other modes, and sometimes find a setting where my voice sounds decent. But then, for whatever reason, the set automatically resets to the version full of static, without any warning. This means that I have recorded tons of video, only to review it, and realize that the static over my voice renders this video useless. I have had to go back numerous times to re-record very lengthy footage, which is frustrating and time-consuming. I looked online for a customer service number, but their website security certificate expired five days ago, and my browser will not let me visit the site. Thus, I cannot even ask for a replacement set.Original review: I use these little microphones to do voiceovers for my TikToks, and they have worked wonderfully. They have vastly improved the sound quality of my narration, and give my videos crystal clear voiceovers. The battery life is also surpassingly impressive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Update: Transmitter no longer works
reviews.reviewText: UPDATE 2/3/2024 - The transmitter is no longer working, making these unusable. We got about 16 months of use. There doesn't appear to be any way to contact the seller for replacement.These work well, sound good and connected easily to the iPhone. We use them for creating content. They are much better than recording my voice in the room. Plus you get 2 so you can have another person in your videos. The only issue we had was not realizing the small front button, closest to the mic, is a mute button. I started a live video after doing a test and the mic worked; then I started the live stream and no one could hear me. I couldn't figure out at that moment what happened, so I took off the mic and went with the phone mic for that stream. Afterwards, I figured out the mute button. So, that's the one thing this needs imo - is some kind of indication when it's muted. However, once I figured out what happened, they work great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome product great price!
reviews.reviewText: This microphone is perfect for videos I need to make on my phone. Love that it comes with 2 and had a mute option. Easy to connect and love that the case charges them as well. Can’t recommend these enough!
